name: Robert Aumann
description:
Do Bible codes exist? Does the Torah contain secret messages that foretell the future? Are there hidden meanings shrouded between the lines?

Short answer: No.

But what about all these prophecies that came true...

No.

But...

NO!

Don't trust us?

Then maybe you should ask Robert Aumann, Nobel-winning economist, mathematician, wearer of fantastic beard, Orthodox Jew. Aumann spent a great deal of time researching Bible codes, analyzing the Torah from every way possible... His answer: No. Well, his short answer.

His long answer: It's possible, but very very very improbable...

So if you want to keep looking, you can. But you're not going to find anything. Too bad there's no Bible code to tell you THAT.
